channel.title: 'Client' Compiler 562 Load 659
channel.description:
Hello, i'm new to making RSPS. And I was just wandering how I could fix my Client Compiler I have the latest - Java & JDK When I try to compile it says :
'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
This is what it shows When i edit compiler. Not sure What I should add to fix it
@echo off javac -cp lib/clientlibs.jar;lib/com.jar; -d bin src/*.java @pause
Please help me, I'm still new. Thanks.

item.title: 'Client' Compiler 562 Load 659
item.dc:creator: @to_ezz to ezz
item.description:
@to_ezz wrote:

Hello, i’m new to making RSPS. And I was just wandering how I could fix my Client Compiler
I have the latest - Java & JDK
When I try to compile it says :

‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

This is what it shows When i edit compiler. Not sure What I should add to fix it

@echo off
javac -cp lib/clientlibs.jar;lib/com.jar; -d bin src/*.java
@pause

Please help me, I’m still new. Thanks.
